flawed_nl_solution:
Dustin reads 1.25 pages a minute because 75 / 60 = <<75/60=1.25>>1.25
Dustin reads 50 pages in 40 minutes because 40 x 1.25 = <<40*1.25=50>>50
Sam reads 0.4 pages a minute because 24 / 60 = <<24/60=0.4>>0.4
Sam reads 16 pages in 40 minutes because 40 x 0.4 = <<40*0.4=16>>16
Dustin reads 36 more pages than Sam because 50 - 16 = <<50-16=36>>36
#### 36

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 34, not 36. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
